name: Music/Beat based FPS
description:
This is a short prototype, unpolished prototype meant to gauge interest in the mechanics being displayed. It has no win state so once you've put the game down please fill out this short survey on your experience.

How to play

The boxes will move towards you in a straight line. You need to shoot at them but can only fire when the square at the top of the screen is green. That square goes green at regular intervals so try and get into that rhythm of firing. Good luck!

Controls

R: Reload
Left mouse button: Shoots gun.
WASD: Movement
Spacebar: Jump
3: Brings out the gun again if you put it away.
